title: Malphite opened with R on a flashless Vladimir when I went to gank
body:
Okay, I'll elaborate.

I was in first top lane brush - we were top team.

Malph sees me in there, so proceeds to duel Vlad. Vlad unleashes everything onto him. I appear. Easy life, right? He fucking uses R as soon as I appear. I don't even have chance to do anything to Vlad. Vlad goes, okay, W, bye.

replies.body: Cool story, definitely needs more Shyvana and cloud drake
